summary: a simple mod that adds all the war paints to all the races.
descriptionHtml:
i think the title say it all but still.
i added all the war paints to all the races only 2 argonian ones are not included on the rest of the races since it really didnt show up plus i added some more colors without replacing any existing one.

install: extract the content to your skyrim data folder and check the box in data files.

added some pics of some war paints.
added more colors to female lips and fixed issue where it didnt show colors on female lips or male either.

have fun.
author: SilverDragonPT

files.name: War Paint plus more colors for lips female
files.fileName: War Paint plus more colors for lips female-8694-1.zip
